QuestData.Title: Round 2: Kang Bramblestaff
QuestData.Description: Your next challenger is a Bramblestaff. Strength is in their blood. I remember a full century of only Bramblestaff champions.$b$bNo pressure, little $r.$b$bGo to the eastern arena north of here and face this young challenger. See first hand if strength is earned or inherited.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: The Bramblestaff family have long held the championship.
